cards.title: The Ram
setup: At the start of the game, {TheRam} enters play “Mechanical Juggernaut” side up.
Search the villain deck for all copies of Up Close and put them in the trash. Put Grappling Claw into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever all active heroes are Up Close, destroy all copies of Fall Back and {TheRam} flips.
At the start of a hero's turn, if that hero is not Up Close, you may take a copy of Up close from the villain trash and play it next to that hero.
Reduce damage dealt to {TheRam} by 1. Increase damage dealt to {TheRam} by Up Close targets by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, {TheRam} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} melee damage.
cards.advanced: Increase damage dealt to Up Close heroes by 1.
flippedGameplay: When {TheRam} flips to this side, search the villain trash for Grappling claw and put it into play.
If a copy of Up Close attached to a hero leaves play, {TheRam} flips.
Increase damage dealt to {TheRam} by hero targets by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, {TheRam} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} melee damage.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Whenever a villain target is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.challengeText: The first time in the game that {TheRam} is reduced to 40 or fewer HP, search the villain deck and trash for a copy of Fall Back and put it into play, then shuffle all cards other than Up Close and Grappling Claw from the villain trash into the villain deck.

cards.title: Barrier Buster
body: Destroy all environment cards.
{TheRam} deals each non-villain target X melee damage, where X = 3 plus the number of cards destroyed this way.

cards.title: Fall Back
body: When this card enters play, {TheRam} deals each Up Close hero target {H - 1} melee damage. Destroy all copies of Up Close in play.
{TheRam} is immune to damage from hero targets that are not Up Close.

cards.title: Falling Meteor
body: Search the villain deck and trash for {H - 2} copies of Up Close and play them next to the {H - 2} heroes with the highest HP that are not up close. If you searched the deck, shuffle it.
{TheRam} deals each non-villain target {H} projectile damage.

cards.title: Forcefield Node
body: This card is immune to damage from hero targets that are not Up Close.
Reduce damage dealt to {TheRam} by 2.
Whenever a copy of Up Close enters play next to a hero, this card deals that hero {H - 2} energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Get in close! That field is{BR}permeable to low-velocity objects.

cards.title: Grappling Claw
body: Increase damage dealt by {TheRam} by 1.

At the end of the villain turn, {TheRam} deals {H - 2} projectile damage to the hero with the lowest HP that is not Up Close. Put a copy of Up Close from the villain trash into play next to that hero.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't think he wants to shake{BR}hands.

cards.title: Personal Defense Spines
body: {TheRam} deals each Up Close hero target {H + 2} melee damage. Destroy all ongoing and equipment cards belonging to those heroes.
{TheRam} deals each other hero target 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Ok, engaging it at point-blank range{BR}is suicide.

cards.title: Power Node
body: This card is immune to damage from hero targets that are not Up Close.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, all Devices and Nodes regain 1 HP.

cards.title: Recharge Circuits
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, if no heroes are Up Close, {TheRam} regains 10 HP and all Devices and Nodes regain 2 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Halberd-19's regenerative{BR}powers warrant the capability to wage{BR}a war of attrition.

cards.title: Remote Mortar
body: This card is immune to damage from hero targets that are Up Close.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each Up Close hero {H - 1} energy damage and those heroes must each discard a card.

flavorQuotes.text: R43 can ballistically deploy mortar{BR}defenses to cover its flanks.

cards.title: Rocket Pod
body: This card is immune to damage from hero targets that are not Up Close.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero that is not Up Close {H - 2} cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Morphology of target Halberd-19 is{BR}unstable//cryogenic rockets//deploy.

cards.title: Up Close
body: When this card enters play, if all active heroes are Up Close, this card is destroyed.
Play this card next to an active hero who is not Up Close. That hero and all their targets are Up Close. That hero gains:
[b]Power:[/b] Destroy this card.

cards.title: Admiral Winters
gameplay: The heroes cannot win the game. If {AdmiralWintersCharacter} would be destroyed, he flips instead.
At the start of a hero's turn, if that hero is not Up Close, you may take a copy of Up Close from the villain trash and play it next to that hero.
{AdmiralWintersCharacter} is immune to damage from targets that are not up close. The first time {AdmiralWintersCharacter} would be dealt damage each turn, redirect that damage to {TheRam}.

At the end of the villain turn, {AdmiralWintersCharacter} deals {H} projectile damage to each hero that is not Up Close. Then, play the top X cards of the villain deck, where X is the number of copies of Up Close in play minus 1.
flippedGameplay: At the start of a hero's turn, if that hero is not Up Close, you may take a copy of Up close from the villain trash and play it next to that hero.
Increase damage dealt to and by {TheRam} by 1.
Whenever a one-shot is placed under {TheRam}'s character card, {TheRam} immediately flips.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.
cards.challengeText: If {TheRam} isn’t in play, other villain cards treat {AdmiralWintersCharacter} as {TheRam}.

promoCards.title: The Ram
setup: At the start of the game, {TheRam} enters play “Amphibious Dreadnought“ side up and {AdmiralWintersCharacter} enters play “Dreadnought Pilot“ side up. Search the villain deck for all copies of Up Close and put them in the trash. Put 2 copies of Remote Mortar into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: If {TheRam} is destroyed remove this card from the game.
Whenever a villain one-shot would enter play, put it beneath this card instead. Cards beneath this one are not considered in play.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are 3 or more cards beneath this one, {TheRam} flips.
flippedGameplay: If {TheRam} is destroyed remove this card from the game.
When {TheRam} flips to this side, it regains {H + 2} HP. Then, put all cards beneath this one into play in any order.
At the start of the villain turn, if {TheRam} did not flip this turn, {TheRam} flips.
Increase projectile damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
promoCards.flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
promoCards.challengeText: At the end of the villain turn, if this card is in play, destroy an equipment card, then put the top card of the villain deck under {TheRam}.

openingLines.default: ADMIRAL WINTERS: I'll blast you all back to whatever time you came from, even if I have to destroy this whole place!
openingLines.PyreCharacter: ADMIRAL WINTERS: Once I've reduced that fancy metal suit to pieces, I'm sure it will prove fascinating to study!
openingLines.QuicksilverCharacter: I see I am not the only one with a metal shell to fight in.
openingLines.PastTheStrangerCharacter: I have seen you before, stranger. What kind of creature are you?
openingLines.PastNecroCharacter: This is no place for you, professor.
openingLines.PastTangoOneCharacter: What a pitiful firearm. Let me show you mine!
openingLines.PastBaccaratCharacter: This is a military exercise. You're all about to be collateral!
openingLines.PastTheKnightCharacter: You challenge me with a sword?
openingLines.PastVanishCharacter: That energy signature...are you the time travelers I have to thank for this technology?
